channel.title: News on M²LInES
channel.description: Recent content in News on M²LInES

item.title: 2021 CESM workshop
item.description: Register for the 26th Annual CESM Workshop on June 14-17. In particular, there will be a session on Machine Learning for CESM on June 17. Info and agenda here

item.title: Call for Papers: Machine learning application to Earth system modeling
item.description: M²LInES members Janni Yuval, Pierre Gentine and Laure Zanna are part of the organizers of a special collection at JAMES (Journal of Advances in Modeling Earth Systems) that will include both new ML methodologies developed for advancing Earth system science and ML applications to Earth system modeling. More information here

item.title: New paper by M²LInES members
item.description: In this paper, M²LInES postdoc Arthur Guillaumin and lead PI Laure Zanna developed a stochastic deep learning parametrization that is trained on high-resolution data from CM2.6, a coupled climate model. Read their paper here
